activities.name: EMOM 3 Min - Burpees (Target: 10)
activities.notes: EMOM: 3 minutes, 10 reps per minute target. Test 'Continue on fail' mode. Try completing less than 10 reps in a minute to see failure tracking.

activities.name: EMOM 5 Min - Push-ups (Target: 15)
activities.notes: EMOM: 5 minutes, 15 reps per minute target. Test 'Stop on first fail' mode. Set fail mode to 'stop' in settings drawer. Complete less than 15 reps in any minute to trigger workout stop.

activities.name: EMOM 4 Min - Squats (Target: 12)
activities.notes: EMOM: 4 minutes, 12 reps per minute. Test both success and failure scenarios. Use +/- buttons to adjust reps during each minute.

activities.name: EMOM 2 Min - Pull-ups (Target: 8)
activities.notes: EMOM: 2 minutes, 8 reps per minute. Shorter duration to test quick failure scenarios.

activities.name: EMOM 3 Min - No Rep Target
activities.notes: EMOM: 3 minutes, no reps target. Should work normally without failure checking. Rep counter should not appear.
